channel.title: Language on Go, the unwritten parts
channel.description: Recent content in Language on Go, the unwritten parts

item.title: Keeping Go a human-first language
item.description: Disclaimer: I forked my opinions on this one from a barely readable Twitter thread and wanted to write it down how I feel about keeping the language internals away from the users, especially from the newcomers. This is not a skill-level concern, it is a core goal of Go to provide a high-level programming language that saves users from excessive mental overhead. Note that these are personal opinons and are not writen on the behalf of a group.
